sentence.Network_en: Sayer was delighted with the smoothness of the engine.
sentence.Network_cn: 塞耶对发动机平稳流畅的运转很是满意。

sentence.Network_en: The smoothness of the flight was memorable.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次平稳顺利的飞行令人难忘。

sentence.Network_en: The'smoothness " of a metal surface depends on the wavelength of the radiation.
sentence.Network_cn: 金属表面的 “ 光洁度 ” 与电磁辐射的波长有关.

entry.def: A smooth surface has no roughness, lumps, or holes.

example.ex: ...a rich cream that keeps skin soft and smooth.
example.tran: 能让皮肤永葆柔嫩光滑的营养霜

entry.tran: 稠度均匀的;细腻匀和的;不结块的
entry.def: A smooth liquid or mixture has been mixed well so that it has no lumps.

example.ex: Continue whisking until the mixture looks smooth and creamy...
example.tran: 一直搅拌，直至混合物变得均匀细腻。

example.ex: Blend the cornflour to a smooth paste with a little cold water.
example.tran: 加入少量的凉水，将玉米粉搅拌成均匀的糊状。

entry.tran: (葡萄酒、威士忌或咖啡等)醇和的，不烈的，不苦的
entry.def: If you describe a drink such as wine, whisky, or coffee as smooth, you mean that it is not bitter and is pleasant to drink.

example.ex: This makes the whiskeys much smoother.
example.tran: 这样一来，威士忌就醇和多了。

entry.def: A smooth line or movement has no sudden breaks or changes in direction or speed.

example.ex: This exercise is done in one smooth motion.

entry.tran: (骑马、航行等)平稳的，顺顺当当的
entry.def: A smooth ride, flight, or sea crossing is very comfortable because there are no unpleasant movements.

example.ex: The active suspension system gives the car a very smooth ride.
example.tran: 这个主动悬架系统使汽车行驶起来非常平稳。

entry.def: You use smooth to describe something that is going well and is free of problems or trouble.

example.ex: Political hopes for a swift and smooth transition to democracy have been dashed...
example.tran: 迅速而顺利地过渡到民主体制的政治希望破灭了。

example.ex: A number of problems marred the smooth running of this event.
example.tran: 一些问题搅乱了这一事件的顺利进展。

entry.tran: 故作殷勤有礼的;精明圆滑的;圆通的
entry.def: If you describe a man as smooth, you mean that he is extremely smart, confident, and polite, often in a way that you find rather unpleasant.

example.ex: Twelve extremely good-looking, smooth young men have been picked as finalists...
example.tran: 12 名特别漂亮精明的青年男子被选为参加决赛的选手。

example.ex: He was the smoothest and probably the most powerful chief of staff in political memory.
example.tran: 在人们关于政治人物的记忆里，他是最精明、可能也是最有权势的参谋长。

entry.def: If you smooth something, you move your hands over its surface to make it smooth and flat.

example.ex: She stood up and smoothed down her frock...

entry.def: If you smooth something somewhere, you use your hands to spread it there.

example.ex: She smoothed the lotion across his shoulder blades...
example.tran: 她在他的肩胛骨上抹了乳液。

example.ex: His fingers smoothed the hair back from her face.
example.tran: 他用手把她脸上的头发捋到脑后。

entry.def: If you smooth the path or smooth the way towards something, you make it easier or more likely to happen.

example.ex: Their talks were aimed at smoothing the path towards a treaty to limit long-range weapons.
example.tran: 他们的会谈旨在为缔结限制远程武器条约铺平道路。

entry.tran: 既能享乐也能吃苦;是好是歹一起承受
entry.def: If you say that someone has to take the rough with the smooth, you mean that they have to accept the unpleasant or difficult things that happen as well as the pleasant things.

means.word_mean: 1. a texture without roughness; smooth to the touch
2. the quality of being free from errors or interruptions

auth_sentence.content: Not a wrinkle marred the smoothness of her skin.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not a wrinkle marred the smoothness of her skin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not a wrinkle marred the smoothness of her skin.

auth_sentence.content: Throughout, musical surprises complement Knight's natural smoothness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Throughout, musical surprises complement Knight's natural smoothness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Throughout, musical surprises complement Knight's natural smoothness.

auth_sentence.content: Theory also assumes smoothness and continuous nature of space.
auth_sentence.res_content: Theory also assumes smoothness and continuous nature of space.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Theory also assumes smoothness and continuous nature of space.
